title: Core smart contracts of Uniswap v4
description: The core smart contracts of Uniswap v4, highlighting v4-core's singleton-style architecture, the management of all pool state in PoolManager.sol, and use of hook contracts to implement callbacks in the lifecycle of pool actions.

title: Uniswap v4 Developer Documents
description: Official V4 Developer Documents from Uniswap Foundation, covering topics including how developer would begin to start building out hooks on local testnets in order to start testing out hook designs.

title: Hook Deployer
description: Hook create2 deployer. This tool can deploy hooks to Ethereum, facilitating the implementation process.

title: Hook Mine And Sinker
description: Mine addresses for UniswapV4 Hooks. This tool generates random addresses eligible to become hooks, useful for testing or deploying your own Hooks.

title: Scaffold Hook
description: Uniswap v4 Hook development stack, complete with testnet deployment and UI. This tool helps builders develop and test Uniswap v4 Hooks with minimal interfaces for the swap lifecycle (pool creation, liquidity provision, and swapping).

title: Peripheral smart contracts for interacting with Uniswap v4
description: v4-periphery hosts the logic that builds on top of the core pool logic like hook contracts, position managers, and even possibly libraries needed for integrations. It is still under development and is being updated as the v4 ecosystem matures. Includes the BaseHook contract that can be used as a base for creating custom hooks.

title: SolidityLabs' Template
description: A Foundry-based template for developing custom pools in Uniswap v4 with hooks.

title: Quantum3 Labs's Scaffold
description: A boilerplate to use Uniswap v4 hooks with scaffold eth, facilitating hook development.

title: Uniswap Foundation's Template
description: A template repository providing a starting point for writing Uniswap V4 hooks, with necessary files and contracts. Ideal for creating custom hooks that execute arbitrary code on swaps. Originally developed by saucepoint.

title: Arrakis' Playground
description: A web-based application for interacting with hooks, allowing testing of your own hooks or learning about their operation. Simulates swaps to test hook functionality.

title: Uniswap's v4 Announcement
description: Official announcement article from Uniswap detailing their vision for v4, including the introduction of hooks.

title: Draft Technical Whitepaper for Uniswap v4 Core
description: Covers an introduction to Uniswap v4, hooks, singleton and flash accounting, native ETH, and other notable features.

title: Uniswap v4 Tests
description: A test suite for working with Uniswap v4 hooks. This suite verifies that your hooks are functioning correctly.

title: Uniswap v4 Hook Test Framework
description: A fuzz testing framework for Uniswap V4 Hooks, built during ETHGlobal 2023. This framework tests the security of your hooks.

title: Uniswap Foundation: v4 by Example
description: A website presenting Solidity snippets for integrating and using Uniswap v4, offering an introduction through simple examples.

title: Gnome101's Hardhat Template
description: A template and playground using hardhat for creating and testing custom hooks.

title: Nick Addison's Template
description: A hook template that includes a factory for mining addresses and generating trace diagrams, aiding in custom hook creation.

title: Lucas Martin Calderon's Template
description: A template for a hook created for the ETHGlobal Hackathon, useful for creating custom hooks to provide liquidity to specific pools.

title: Solidity Developer: Integrate Uniswap v4 and create a custom hook
description: A deep dive tutorial showcasing the mechanisms for executing fees, Ethereum address prefixes for hooks contracts, and using CREATE2 for deterministic contract deployment.

title: James Bachini: Introduction to Hooks
description: A tutorial on using the "beforeSwap" hook function to implement custom actions during a swap.

title: Captain Hook: Uniswap Hooks Tutorial
description: A tutorial featuring three different proofs of concept hooks, each accompanied by a tutorial blog post.

title: Umbrella Research: A Deep Dive With Captain Hook (I)
description: A tutorial demonstrating how developers can implement role-based features within the Uniswap v4 protocol.

title: Uniswap v4: Hooks, Singletons and Controversy (Blockcast)
description: A 22-minute video exploring Uniswap v4, with a focus on hooks and related discussion points.

title: Uniswap V4 Deep Dive with Head of Protocols Sara Reynolds (The Defiant)
description: A 75-minute deep dive into Uniswap v4 with Sara Reynolds, discussing hooks and potential attack vectors.

title: Hayden Adams on what makes v4 special (Unchained Podcast)
description:
An 80-minute video featuring Hayden Adams discussing the unique aspects of Uniswap v4, including hooks, their uses, and security concerns.
Section: üìπ Videos

title: Hayden Adams announcing the release of Uniswap V4 (Bankless)
description: A 90-minute video where Hayden Adams covers the release of Uniswap v4, including details on the hook-centric roadmap.

title: Saucepoint: Getting Started with the v4-template
description: A guide to using the v4-template for creating custom hooks, including testing and troubleshooting tips.

title: Uniswap V4: What You Need to Know
description: This insightful blog traces the evolutionary journey of Uniswap, from its initial V1 release to the latest V4 iteration. It delves into the key enhancements each version brought, from simple ERC-20 and ETH token swaps in V1, to the complex liquidity provisions in specific price ranges in V3, setting the stage for the anticipated innovations in V4.

title: Nadison Playground for Uniswap v4 Hooks
description: This resource covers a range of features and functionalities of Uniswap v4 Hooks. It includes an exploration of lifecycle hooks like initialize, position, swap, and donate, management of hook-based fees, protocol fees on swaps and withdrawals, support for ERC-1155 token accounting, native ETH pools akin to Uniswap V1, and the capability to donate liquidity to pools.

title: Liquidity management
description: In this article, we cover the design of our Liquidity management hook from our Uniswap Foundation Hook POC grant.

title: On-Chain Limit Orders Hook Creation in Uniswap V4
description: This YouTube video guides viewers through the process of creating on-chain limit orders hooks for Uniswap v4 using Foundry and Solidity. It is an essential resource for developers interested in smart contract development and integration with decentralized finance platforms.

title: Uniswap V2 Visualization
description: This resource offers a graphical representation of the Uniswap V2 protocol, providing clear visual insights into its operational mechanics. It's an essential tool for understanding the underlying mathematical functions and liquidity curves that drive the Uniswap V2 automated market maker model.

title: Uniswap v4 Periphery
description: Uniswap v4 represents a significant advancement in automated market maker protocols, emphasizing extensibility and customization. The v4-periphery serves as a pivotal component, housing the logic that enhances core pool functionalities, including hook contracts, position managers, and potential integration libraries. The contracts within this repository are under ongoing development, with additional periphery contracts yet to be established.

title: On-Chain "Take-Profit" Orders in Uniswap V4
description: Explore the power of Uniswap v4's hooks to create fully on-chain "take-profit" orders. This resource illuminates how custom hooks can modify DEX functionalities without forking Uniswap, allowing for innovative trading strategies and enhanced user experience in decentralized exchanges.

title: KYC Verification Hook in Uniswap V4 and Its Impact
description: This resource discusses the controversial KYC (Know Your Customer) verification hook in Uniswap v4. It sheds light on the debates and discussions within the DeFi community regarding privacy and regulatory compliance in decentralized finance.

title: Liquidity management
description: In this article, we cover the design of our Liquidity management hook from our Uniswap Foundation Hook POC grant.

title: Uniswap V4 Explained
description: Uniswap V4 marks a significant leap in decentralized exchange technology, introducing "hooks" for enhanced customization and cost-efficiency in DeFi trading. This resource offers a comprehensive overview of its key innovations, including the singleton model for reduced gas costs, dynamic fee adjustments, and advanced flash accounting, positioning Uniswap V4 as a game-changer in the DeFi landscape.

title: Expanding Opportunities with Uniswap V4 Hooks
description: A comprehensive guide on the potential and capabilities of Uniswap v4 hooks for developers. This resource delves into the technical aspects and innovative features of Uniswap v4, offering insights into how it's transforming the DeFi space.

title: Locking liquidity
description: Locking liquidity hook POC, the design, and the options it presents. Built by builders, for builders.

title: Dynamic Fees
description: The second hook from our Hook POC Uniswap Foundation grant adjusts the swapping fees based on the trading volume.

title: Uniswap V3 (Multiple Positions) Visualization
description: This resource uniquely visualizes the multi-faceted aspects of managing multiple positions within Uniswap V3. It offers a comprehensive view of how different positions interact and affect the overall dynamics of the Uniswap V3 ecosystem.
